alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 18 at 4:01PM CST until December 18 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEBB COUNTY... At 401 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ranchitos Las Lomas, or 22 miles east of Laredo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Ranchitos Las Lomas. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 802 and 810. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
